body_html: LSTMStateTuple is just a tuple. You can create it with two placeholders and when you run session, pass values for those placeholders with the feed_dict param. To evaluate an LSTMStateTuple, simply call session.run(lstm_state_tuple).
body_text: LSTMStateTuple is just a tuple.  You can create it with two placeholders and when you run session, pass values for those placeholders with the feed_dict param.  To evaluate an LSTMStateTuple, simply call session.run(lstm_state_tuple).
body: LSTMStateTuple is just a tuple.  You can create it with two placeholders and when you run session, pass values for those placeholders with the feed_dict param.  To evaluate an LSTMStateTuple, simply call session.run(lstm_state_tuple).
